servinfo.title: Fuel Tank Inlet Valve Removal and Installation

attention1.ptxt: When performing the following procedure, be sure to observe Precautions for Fuel System Service:J24B to reduce the risk of fire and personal injury.

s1.ptxt: Insert hose of a hand operated pump into fuel filler hose (1) and drain fuel in space “A” shown in figure.

item.ptxt: Do not force pump hose into fuel tank.
Store drained fuel in an airtight container to reduce the risk of fire and personal injury.

s1.ptxt: Hoist vehicle, and remove clamps (2) and fuel filler hose (1) from fuel tank.
Remove fuel tank inlet valves (1) using flat-blade screwdriver (2) or the like.

attention2.ptxt: Be careful not to damage fuel tank inlet valve (1) with flat-blade screwdriver (2) or the like.

s1.ptxt: Install fuel tank inlet valves (1) to and fuel tank.
Install fuel filler hose (1) to fuel filler neck and fuel tank and secure it with clamps (2).
For proper installation, refer to Fuel Hose Disconnecting and Reconnecting:J24B .
Lower vehicle and install fuel filler cap.
